DOC.brief_summary: A Randomized , Multi-Center , Double-Blind , Vehicle-Controlled Study
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Product 33525 Pediatric Subjects With Tinea Corporis
DOC.detailed_description: A Randomized , Multi-Center , Double-Blind , Vehicle-Controlled Study Evaluating Safety Efficacy Product 33525 Pediatric Subjects Tinea Corporis
DOC.criteria: Key Subjects ( legal guardian/caregiver ) ability willingness sign write informed consent and/or assent ( age appropriate ) . Subject either gender must least 2 year < 18 year age ( 2 17 year , inclusive ) . Subjects clinical diagnosis tinea corporis characterize clinical evidence tinea infection ( least moderate erythema , mild scaling , moderate pruritus ) Subjects must good general health free disease Investigator 's opinion might interfere study evaluation . Subjects/caregiver must able communicate , able understand study procedure , willing comply study requirement . Key Subjects active atopic contact dermatitis area treat . Subjects severe dermatophytoses , mucocutaneous candidiasis , bacterial skin infection . Female subject pregnant and/or nursing planning pregnancy course trial . Subjects test positive pregnancy start test treatment discontinue test treatment follow safety purpose . Subjects immunocompromised ( due disease , e.g. , HIV medication ) . Subjects recent history current drug alcohol abuse .
